overview: "Felipe, a sailor falls madly in love with Valencia, a Spanish dancing girl, who is sought after by Don Fernando, the governor. When Felipe deserts his ship, the Don throws him in prison, but Valencia obtains his release and shares his disgrace and exile." Moving Picture World, 8 Jan 1927, p. 144.
tagline: Venus De Milo, and nothing on her, but she had Venus by a pair of arms, and, o, those eyes! Fiery Spanish love- impetuous escapades- roars chasing thrills across a whirlwind romance!
title: Valencia
